std.value: Helen went home alone after school and met a middle-aged woman on the way. The middle-aged woman said to Helen, "My child, I lost my wallet. I have no money for dinner and no money for home. Can you lend me some money?" Helen looked at her and gave her ten yuan. But the next day, she saw the woman again, who was asking a little boy for money. Helen immediately realized that she was a liar. She dialed the 110 and the police came to arrest the woman.

std.value: Helen went home alone after school and met a middle-aged woman on the way. The middle-aged woman looked poor, so Helen came up and asked the woman what was the matter. The woman said she had lost her purse and hadn't the money to go home, and wondered whether she could borrow some money from Helen. Helen gave the woman the money without any hesitation. However, on the next day, she came across the woman for the second time, and was asking some money from a little boy. It wasn't until then that Helen realized that she had been cheated out of the money and reported it to the police. Finally, the policeman came and took the woman into the police car.
